name: Card Hog (itch) (SnoutUp)
description:
Pick a pig card and embark on a grid-based dungeon crawl jam-packed with weird creatures, dangerous traps, powerful weapons and magic!

CHOOSE YOUR HOG

Try out different pigs with unique card loadouts and skills to find your favorite playstyle!

FEATURES
  • Quite addictive dungeon crawling
  • Dozens of enemies and bosses to discover and defeat
  • Playable hogs with different card sets and perks
  • Tons of cards and their combinations to discover
  • Local multiplayer for fighting with or against your friends
  • Humorous shenanigans
EARLY ACCESS

Game is currently in Early Access and being actively developed. Much more content coming soon in form of mechanics, cards, characters and game modes!

STEAM

Steam keys are available with every purchase in case you would like to see what Workshop has to offer or to adventure with friends using Remote Play Together.

CONTENT CREATION

Streaming Card Hog or creating videos about it is highly appreciated and free keys are available for creators who contact me on Twitter or via email. You can find a few pieces of key art in this page.

CREDITS

Code: @SnoutUp,  art: @EmiliusDraws
Design inspired by Look Your Loot and Dungeon Cards.
